mapper.insert: insert into EVALUATION_RATING ( M_ID , CARD_NO , CONTENT , E_RATING ) select #{mId}, #{cardNo}, #{content}, #{eRating} from dual where not exists ( select M_ID, CARD_NO from EVALUATION_RATING where CARD_NO = #{cardNo} AND M_ID = #{mId} )
mapper.select: select e.CARD_NO , e.M_ID , e.CONTENT , e.REG_DATE , e.E_RATING , e.deleted , sum(el.ER_LIKED) E_LIKED_SUM from EVALUATION_RATING e left outer join EVALUATION_RATING_LIKED el on e.CARD_NO = el.CARD_NO AND e.M_ID = el.M_ID where e.CARD_NO = #{cardNo} group by e.M_ID, e.CARD_NO
